question: Who is responsible for my gift registry? Who should I contact if I have any questions or problems?
answer: While Kallah Registry has a gift registry consultant available at your disposal, you are also able to update and make changes to it from your own computer or smartphone. That’s the power of having a registry in the palm of your hand. Rest assured that you are always connected to our experts. If you have any questions you can always reach the registry at 1-844-KALLAH-1 or email at info@kallahregistry.com

question: How does the gift registry work?
answer: It’s easy! You can open your gift registry free of charge through our website at http://kallahregistry.com or you can utilize the help of one of our consultants. Once you create your registry, just add items and sit back to watch your gifts come in! Formal or everyday dinnerware, kitchenware, bedding, decoration, bathroom accessories, gifts, and even custom & monogram gifts- the possibilities are endless. Your consultant will help you make choices that reflect your lifestyle and your needs, no matter your budget.

question: When items are purchased, is my registry automatically updated?
answer: Yes, every time guests buy items in your registry, be it online or in store, your registry is updated.

question: What if I change my mind?
answer: Items are exchangeable within 60 days of delivery. If you wish to exchange a gift that was given, our associates will be glad to help you out. All items must be returned in their original packaging. Exchanges and credits are not possible for special orders or imported items. Please email info@kallahregistry.com for a RA (Return Authorization) number. Store Credit will be issued.

question: How do we let our guests know that we have entrusted our gift registry to Kallah Registry?
answer: When you open your gift registry, you are given the option of sharing your registry to friends and family with email or social media with your custom share link. We also offer a Registry Announcement service. Send us your invitation list and we will create a beautiful custom announcement card and mail them out completely free of charge!

question: How can I edit my contact details in my gift registry?
answer: You can access your account online and edit your profile. Your password and passcode will be created by you when you create your registry. You can also call a consultant at any time, and they will gladly help you with any changes.

question: Can I order over the phone?
answer: Absolutely! We understand it's sometimes easier to talk to a representative when placing an order. Call us anytime Monday-Thursday from 9am to 5pm, & Friday- 9am to 1pm. Our number is: (844) KALLAH-1

question: Does Kallah Registry Gift Wrap?
answer: Yes! We offer free gift wrapping on most items. Items will be wrapped in paper with a bow, however oversized items cannot be gift wrapped.

question: Does Kallah Registry ship internationally?
answer: Yes, Please contact us for more information.

question: Can you order products from Kallah Registry that are not displayed on the website?
answer: Yes, we love and appreciate all feedback. Contact us to let us know what you were interested in that was not displayed.

question: When can I expect my items to arrive?
answer: Please allow up to 4 weeks for delivery.
